data.name: Wolf-Fang
data.passiveDescription: DMG dealt by Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst is increased by {{16//20//24//28//32%}}. When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, its CRIT Rate will be increased by {{2//2.5//3//3.5//4%}}. When an Elemental Burst hits an opponent, its CRIT Rate will be increased by {{2//2.5//3//3.5//4%}}. Both of these effects last 10s separately, have 4 max stacks, and can be triggered once every 0.1s.
